response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price that reflects its true worth. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this price not only offers you a significant saving but also ensures a fair transaction for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this remarkable acquisition for you.", "product_price": 1200000}
